about_the_game:
Labyrinth Hotel is an immersive first-person, action-adventure, platformer video game featuring driving and shooting levels. The game offers three endings: two are straightforward, but achieving the true ending requires some backtracking and swimming. The setting is dark and realistic, contrasting with the bright, cartoony characters and cel-shaded enemies, making them stand out and instantly recognizable.



The environments also present stark contrasts. You'll navigate tight spaces and cramped hallways that evoke a sense of entrapment, and vast, foggy areas populated by large creatures, which may or may not be passive, playing into the fear of the unknown.



Some levels contain guest books that can be collected and read later, providing additional insights into the world and its characters.




All the enemy and boss models are made by me therefore they are completely copyright free and can be used by anyone who is interested in game development.

Notice: I've added an Introductory guide/manual on the right below release date, so if some of the more unique mechanics are a bit confusing that should explain them in more detail than the tutorial.

Labyrinth Hotel is an immersive first-person, action-adventure, platformer video game featuring driving and shooting levels. The game offers three endings: two are straightforward, but achieving the true ending requires some backtracking and swimming. The setting is dark and realistic, contrasting with the bright, cartoony characters and cel-shaded enemies, making them stand out and instantly recognizable.



The environments also present stark contrasts. You'll navigate tight spaces and cramped hallways that evoke a sense of entrapment, and vast, foggy areas populated by large creatures, which may or may not be passive, playing into the fear of the unknown.



Some levels contain guest books that can be collected and read later, providing additional insights into the world and its characters.




All the enemy and boss models are made by me therefore they are completely copyright free and can be used by anyone who is interested in game development.

Notice: I've added an Introductory guide/manual on the right below release date, so if some of the more unique mechanics are a bit confusing that should explain them in more detail than the tutorial.
name: Labyrinth Hotel

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2.40 GHz
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • VR Support: NOT VR COMPATIBLE
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3.60 GHz
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • VR Support: NOT VR COMPATIBLE

short_description: Labyrinth Hotel is an immersive, first-person, action-adventure game where the player wakes up locked in a jail cell and must escape, but the only way out is through the Hotel. Contains 20 unique levels, 4 bosses, many unique characters, a cool crt effect, and many secret levels.
